Golden and wrath cookies appear %1% more.english: Golden and wrath cookies appear %1% more.
Golden and wrath cookies appear %1% more.chinese: 黄金和愤怒饼干出现几率增加 1%。

Golden and wrath cookies appear %1% less.english: Golden and wrath cookies appear %1% less.
Golden and wrath cookies appear %1% less.chinese: 黄金和愤怒饼干出现几率减少 1%。

All golden cookies are wrath cookies wit.english: All golden cookies are wrath cookies with a greater chance of a negative effect.
All golden cookies are wrath cookies wit.chinese: 所有的黄金饼干将替换为愤怒饼干，产生负面影响的可能性更大。

Soil unlocked at %1 farms..chinese: 拥有 %1 个农场解锁该土壤。

You will be able to change your soil aga.english: You will be able to change your soil again in %1.
You will be able to change your soil aga.chinese: 你可以在 %1后再次更改你的土壤。

Click to use this type of soil for your.english: Click to use this type of soil for your whole field.
Click to use this type of soil for your.chinese: 点击此处可在整个农场使用此类土壤。

Simple, regular old dirt that you'd find.english: Simple, regular old dirt that you'd find in nature.
Simple, regular old dirt that you'd find.chinese: 你在自然界中发现的普通、常见的旧泥土。

This tile of soil is empty.<br>Pick a se.english:
This tile of soil is empty.
Pick a seed and plant something!
This tile of soil is empty.<br>Pick a se.chinese:
这块土地是空的。
选一粒种子，种点东西吧！

This is your magic meter. Each spell cos.english:
This is your magic meter. Each spell costs magic to use.
Your maximum amount of magic varies depending on your amount of Wizard towers, and their level.
Magic refills over time. The lower your magic meter, the slower it refills.
This is your magic meter. Each spell cos.chinese:
这是你的魔能计量表。每个法术都需要消耗魔能。
你的魔能上限取决于你的巫师塔的数量及其等级。
魔能会随着时间的推移而重新填满。你的魔能计量表越低，它重新填满的速度就越慢。

Click to refill <b>%1 units</b> of your.english: Click to refill %1 units of your magic meter for %2.
Click to refill <b>%1 units</b> of your.chinese: 点击消耗%2为魔能计量表充能%1 个魔能。

Summon half an hour worth of your CpS, c.english: Summon half an hour worth of your CpS, capped at %1% of your cookies owned.
Summon half an hour worth of your CpS, c.chinese: 召唤半小时CpS的饼干,上限为你当前饼干数的 %1%。

Summon a random golden cookie. Each exis.english: Summon a random golden cookie. Each existing golden cookie makes this spell +%1% more likely to backfire.
Summon a random golden cookie. Each exis.chinese: 召唤一个随机的黄金饼干。每一个现有的黄金饼干都会使这个魔法产生反效果的几率 +%1%。

All active buffs gain %1% more time (up.english: All active buffs gain %1% more time (up to %2 more minutes).
All active buffs gain %1% more time (up.chinese: 所有已激活的增益状态延长 %1% （最多延长 %2 分钟）。

All active buffs are shortened by %1% (u.english: All active buffs are shortened by %1% (up to %2 minutes shorter).
All active buffs are shortened by %1% (u.chinese: 所有已激活的增益状态缩短 %1% （最多缩短 %2 分钟）。

No buffs to alter!.chinese: 没有已激活的增益状态！

The spell picks a random building you co.english: The spell picks a random building you could afford if you had twice your current cookies, and gives it to you for free. The building selected must be under %1, and cannot be your most-built one (unless it is your only one).
The spell picks a random building you co.chinese: 如果你有两倍于现在的饼干，咒语会随机挑选一栋你能买得起的建筑，并将其免费送给你。该建筑数量必须在%1以下，并且不能是你数量最多的建筑（除非它是你唯一的建筑）。

One of your %1<br>disappears in a puff o.english:
One of your %1
disappears in a puff of smoke.
One of your %1<br>disappears in a puff o.chinese:
一个%1
消失在一股烟雾中。

Upgrades are %1% more expensive for an h.english: Upgrades are %1% more expensive for an hour.

Buildings are %1% more expensive for an.english: Buildings are %1% more expensive for an hour.

Cast a random spell at half the magic co.english: Cast a random spell at half the magic cost, with twice the chance of backfiring.
Cast a random spell at half the magic co.chinese: 随机施放一个魔法，魔法费用减半，有两倍的几率发生反效果。

Instantly summon a wrinkler if condition.english: Instantly summon a wrinkler if conditions are fulfilled.
Instantly summon a wrinkler if condition.chinese: 如果满足条件，立即召唤一条饼干虫。

Spells backfire %1 times less for the ne.english: Spells backfire %1 times less for the next %2 minutes.
Spells backfire %1 times less for the ne.chinese: 在接下来的 %2 分钟内，咒语的适得其反次数减少了 %1 次。

Spells backfire %1 times more for the ne.english: Spells backfire %1 times more for the next %2 minutes.
Spells backfire %1 times more for the ne.chinese: 在接下来的 %2 分钟内，咒语还会适得其反 %1 次。

Release to assign %1 to this slot..english: Release to assign %1 to this slot.

Drag a spirit onto this slot to assign i.english: Drag a spirit onto this slot to assign it.
Drag a spirit onto this slot to assign i.chinese: 把一个神灵拖到这个槽上进行分配。

If a golden cookie is clicked, this spir.english: If a golden cookie is clicked, this spirit is unslotted and all worship swaps will be used up.
If a golden cookie is clicked, this spir.chinese: 如果点击了一个黄金饼干，这个神灵将被移出槽，所有的交换次数都将被消耗。

Each time you slot a spirit, you use up.english:
Each time you slot a spirit, you use up one worship swap.
If you have 2 swaps left, the next one will refill after %1.
If you have 1 swap left, the next one will refill after %2.
If you have 0 swaps left, you will get one after %3.
Unslotting a spirit costs no swaps.
Each time you slot a spirit, you use up.chinese:
每次把一个神灵拖到槽上，你就消耗了一次交换次数。
如果你还有 2 次交换次数，下一次交换次数将在%1之后补充。
如果你还有 1 次交换次数，下一次交换次数将在%2之后补充。
如果你还有 0 次交换次数，你将在%3之后得到 1 次交换次数。
将一个神灵移出槽不需要消耗交换次数。

Click to refill all your worship swaps f.english: Click to refill all your worship swaps for %1.
Click to refill all your worship swaps f.chinese: 点击消耗%1以补充所有的交换次数。
